description:
This market refers to the LoL match between Eintracht Frankfurt and Berlin International Gaming in the Comedy Central Winter Snowdown Playoffs, scheduled for February 4 at 11:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Eintracht Frankfurt" if Eintracht Frankfurt win Game 3 against Berlin International Gaming.

This market will resolve to "Berlin International Gaming" if Berlin International Gaming win Game 3 against Eintracht Frankfurt.

If the match begins but is not completed, and Game 3 is concluded with a winner determined, this market will resolve based on the completed Game 3. 

If Game 3 is not completed for any reason, this market will resolve 50-50. 

If the match is canceled (not played at all) or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without play beginning, this market will resolve 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page.

events.description:
This market refers to the LoL match between Eintracht Frankfurt and Berlin International Gaming in the Comedy Central Winter Snowdown Playoffs, scheduled for February 4 at 11:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Eintracht Frankfurt" if Eintracht Frankfurt win the match against Berlin International Gaming.

This market will resolve to "Berlin International Gaming" if Berlin International Gaming win the match against Eintracht Frankfurt.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page.
events.title: LoL: Eintracht Frankfurt vs Berlin International Gaming (BO5) - Comedy Central Winter Snowdown Playoffs

question: LoL: Eintracht Frankfurt vs Berlin International Gaming - Game 3 Winner
